data.name: DOA5LR Halloween Costumes 2017 Full Set
data.detailed_description:
This is the value set which includes "Halloween Costumes 2017" for all character of DOA5LR.
This set includes 35 costumes for all 35 characters.
As it has become customary, the costumes for this set were carefully selected and recreated by the Team NINJA staff from the submissions made for the "Design Challenge 2017."

Characters:
- All 35 characters with exception for Mai Shiranui

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

data.short_description: This is the value set which includes "Halloween Costumes 2017" for all character of DOA5LR. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
